title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist in a Java file, the file is being marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made to it.
EB: The file should remain unchanged and not be marked as dirtied when using code assist.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a Java file. 
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. 
3. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I); 
4. Press Ctrl + Space.
